extendedInfo.description: Classic snake game for android platform with colorful glow graphics.Yet another awsome game from Feelingtouch Inc.challenge yourself with others from all over the worldFeatures:* Control the snake using gestures(slide fingers on screen).* build-in game box support.* Speed up when eat more and more blocks* The snake will grow up when eat more and more blocks.Enjoy yourself

reviews.title: Force Closes
reviews.comment: Force closes after I pass the ad. It shows me the ad, it fades away, the screen turn black and then I appear at my home screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Complicated
reviews.comment: Omg I dnt get dis game I played it like 20 times but I got the hang of it lol.:)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: R.I.P. Glow Snake
reviews.comment: It used to work and it was great but now it doesn\'t. Try downloading it if you feel lucky.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The 7th best
reviews.comment: This game is awesome i have no problems with it n its fun trying to get to number 1 place (im in 7th place)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple but great!
reviews.comment: Don\'t know what\'s going on with everyone else, I\'ve never had a problem with it ever and most people are probably tapping rather than swiping because it\'s always been very responsive for me and all my friends have played it perfectly. I love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is so boring don\'t download saving u time nd space
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really??
reviews.comment: I absoutely loved it at first but I unistalled because I played 3 times and it will not load anymore.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Never got to play it force closes on razr maxx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ok
reviews.comment: Pretty flat snake game. Would be better with tap controlls, instead of swipe.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Good game but it closes every time i try to play unless i uninstall then reinstall it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: stupid
reviews.comment: it force closed every time. i wud hav give it 0 stars if i cud. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: IT\'S GONE!!!
reviews.comment: I played this game all day and loved it. Trying to play this morning and when I open it goes to a black screen then back to the screen the widgets are on. I uninstalled and re-installed and get the same thing when I try to open!!! I really loved this game and would\'ve given it 5 stars if I could play it!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Abc
reviews.comment: Idk what everyone is talking about. This app is awesome. Works perfectly fine for my atrix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This sucks
reviews.comment: It would not let me play.!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This game uses most of your phone battery but if it does work it is quite fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great effects, but too easy.
reviews.comment: It takes quite a while for the snake to speed it. It\'s a bit slower than the usual snake games, but overall still pretty great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aswome
reviews.comment: it works great on cricket lg optimus :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Always goes back to my home page
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FC\'s after first use. Every time thereafter.
reviews.comment: Displays a game dialogue box to download another game I do not want then crashes. Unable to load any further. Played one time and that was all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WTF!!!!!!
reviews.comment: WTF THIS GAME WONT EVEN PLAY IT JUST CLOSES HATE IT >:^#
